title: [Hotfix] Bring back warnings and -Werror to ATen
body_html:
The recent cmake change has:

  1. Removed all warnings we had manually enabled for ATen
  2. Removed the ability to pass WERROR=1 to your local build to enable -Werror

This PR undoes these two things. Please merge this ASAP, otherwise code with warnings gets pushed to master and will annoy everyone whose CI subsequently breaks.

@orionr @soumith
body_text:

@orionr @soumith
body:
The recent cmake change has:
1. Removed all warnings we had manually enabled for ATen
2. Removed the ability to pass `WERROR=1`  to your local build to enable `-Werror`

This PR undoes these two things. Please merge this ASAP, otherwise code with warnings gets pushed to master and will annoy everyone whose CI subsequently breaks.

@orionr @soumith
